article_text:
Rapid City, SD

Rapid City Police are investigating an early morning shooting involving a private security officer.

Just before 3 a.m Sunday police responded to a Common Cents convenience store on Mt. Rushmore Road for a weapons call. Authorities discovered that a private security officer from Black Hills Patrol had responded to a disturbance in the area.

The security officer came across a subject at the intersection of Tower Road and Cathedral Drive. The interaction led to the security officer shooting the subject.

The subject was taken to Rapid City Regional Hospital and was treated for non-life threatening injuries. The investigation of the incident is ongoing.

Rapid City, SDRapid City Police are investigating an early morning shooting involving a private security officer.
Authorities discovered that a private security officer from Black Hills Patrol had responded to a disturbance in the area.
The interaction led to the security officer shooting the subject.
The security officer came across a subject at the intersection of Tower Road and Cathedral Drive.
The subject was taken to Rapid City Regional Hospital and was treated for non-life threatening injuries.
